mainTopic.title: Genital warts
mainTopic.content_info: The uploaded materials in the PDF files are sometimes in outline form, not as continuous text, therefore it does not include every information but serves as a great foundation to form the questions and provide focus on core content, however additional background knowledge is needed to create quality revision quizzes. Some subtopics of certain topics do not follow each other in order.

quizzes.question: Where are genital warts most commonly found in circumcised men?
quizzes.goodAnswer: On the shaft or base of the penis

quizzes.question: In women with genital warts, what percentage represents cervix involvement in more recent studies?
What are the characteristics of classic condylomata acuminata?
quizzes.goodAnswer: Pointed, cauliflower-like lesions found on moist surfaces
quizzes.wrongAnswer_1: Smooth, flat lesions found in dry areas
quizzes.wrongAnswer_2: Hard, wart-like lesions found on the cervix
quizzes.wrongAnswer_3: Vascular, soft lesions found only on the labia
quizzes.wrongAnswer_4: Dry, keratotic lesions found on penile shaft

quizzes.question: What type of genital warts lack the cauliflower appearance?
Which symptom is NOT commonly associated with genital warts?
What might large masses of genital warts cause?
Why might genital warts increase in size and number during pregnancy?
quizzes.goodAnswer: Due to reduced host cell-mediated immunity and steroid hormone effects

quizzes.question: What is a common issue with vaginal warts in pregnancy?
What is the primary method for diagnosing external genital warts?
Which lesions need to be biopsied when diagnosing genital warts?
quizzes.goodAnswer: Lesions larger than 1 cm or those that are pigmented

quizzes.question: Which other condition can present symptoms similar to genital warts?
